OOC: Robertdahl...I'm a little slow in thinking today..I apologize
for 
any misunderstanding. *Goofy Grin* You can adress me personally as 
Northlight...It's my studio name and I'm trying to get people to call 
me it anyway. 
    As for e-mailing me, I'm on the website. My e-mail is right there 
under my character write ups. It's a pain in the arse to do, I 
know..you know..looking up the character and trying to find my 
e-mail... *Sticks out tongue*
*******************


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Torca:::
> 
> Torca: Once a Decepticon huh? Well, it seems you aren't one now,
and 
i don't 
> hold grudges.  The names Torca.
> ::He puts out his hand for a handshake::

::REDHOT::

    Redhot smiles widely and shakes Torca's hand, then gives him a 
hearty pat on the shoulder.
    "Do you... have any id...idea how ...rare it is for me... to hear 
that?" he said. "Most..people...flip when..they..know I 
..on..onc..once was a Decepticon." He wheezed deeply. "More... than 
once ...I've been... attacked for being... related... to... 
Starscream." His eyes fell on Cliffjumper and Firedrill with his last 
comment. They lingered there, studying the two Autobots in a peaceful 
manner. He then looked away, his gaze reaching into the sky.
    "I wasn't... happy... as a warrior." he said. "That's... all you 
need to know...for now."

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

*****************************
